segments.text: Hi , dear , do you know what the important day is today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , dear . I know you mustn ’ t forget it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s Saturday , a great weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ur , you really let me down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t be angry with me . I have a bad memory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you haven ’ t . You just don ’ t care about me . You ’ re an indifferent husband .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What day is it on earth ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s an anniversary of our weeding .
segments.speaker: S1
